addr: 919 South Grand Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90015
title: Package 3: FIDM Open House & DEBUT Runway Show
desc: This package includes: Enjoy a tour of our award-winning campus and listen to FIDM experts address Housing Options, Part-Time Jobs, and Career Opportunities. Also get career advice from FIDM Grads! Lunch will be served, and there will be time for questions. Your transportation to DEBUT from FIDM will be provided with the purchase of an Open House ticket. All FIDM Open House Guests MUST use the roundtrip bus transportation, as parking is extremely limited at the Barker Hangar. *Please note: Hotel and/or flight not included. Students must make their own hotel and flight arrangements. An invitation-only Fashion Show & Gala Event. FIDM's DEBUT Show is the only student runway show like it on the West Coast. The celebrity guest will be  Project Runway  star and FIDM Grad Nick Verreos.
